title: The Convergence of the Twain - speaker's attitude

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hardy uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the sinking of the ship.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hardy uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the sinking of the ship.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
